divs: Sighting DetailsIm a crewmember on a private yacht out of palm beach florida. We were headed out to riveria beach to fuel up. As we passed a "super yacht" marina I snapped a picture of the yacht designed and owned by Steve Jobs. Today 3 days later I downloaded picture to my computer and noticed something in the sky, zoomed in and it is not a plane, helicopter, or the goodyear blimp (wich we see all the time in south Florida). Pretty interesting. Cant figure this one out. I am not a stranger to sightings and have contacted MUFON on a few occasions. Last sighting was the end of 2012 around christmas time in Rhode Island when a HUGE saucer shaped object passed VERY VERY low right over me and friends. I believe the MUFON investigator I spoke to was BOB. Because of my job I did not let anyone else know about this.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lake Park
There were no other sightings in Lake Park on or around April 26th 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: I was out on a private yacht from palm beach heading north taking pictures
